channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Kansas Jayhawks Coach Bill Self on Darryn Peterson: 'He's Not at Full Strength'
item.description: As Kansas freshman Darryn Peterson is sidelined with a quad injury, Bill Self provided a murky update on the star guard's return.

item.title: 2025 NFL Week 16 Best Bets, Expert Picks: Back Low-Scoring Rams-Seahawks Tilt
item.description: Check out Geoff Schwartz' NFL Week 16 best bets, including how he's wagering on a huge NFC West showdown and why he's fading K.C.

item.title: Michigan State Head Coach Tom Izzo After Dominant Win: 'I'm Never Satisfied'
item.description: Following its convincing win over Toledo, Michigan State Spartans head coach Tom Izzo explained why he's "never satisfied."

item.title: 2025 NFL Week 16 Buzz: Dolphins Bench Tua Tagovailoa, Former Texas Star Starting
item.description: We're down to the final three weeks of the 2025 NFL regular season, with each bit of news across the league becoming more and more critical.

item.title: BetMGM Bonus Code 'FOXSPORTS' Gets Up to $1,500 Paid Back in Bonus Bets
item.description: Use BetMGM Bonus Code FOXSPORTS to get up to $1,500 back in Bonus Bets if your first wager loses. Claim your BetMGM welcome offer today.

item.title: Can NBA Cup's surprise finalists make a Finals run? Why there's already a road map
item.description: Breaking down how the finalist Spurs and semifinalist Magic can use their cup experience for the postseason.

item.title: Sources: Dolphins bench Tua in favor of Ewers
item.description: The Dolphins are benching quarterback Tua Tagovailoa and turning to rookie Quinn Ewers as their new starter, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter.

item.title: The anti-anhedonic Aggies: Can Mike Elko and this Texas A&M team make all the talk about the past stop?
item.description: The Aggies head into their first College Football Playoff appearance looking to banish the program's ghosts.

item.title: Alcaraz splits with coach after 7 years, 6 Slams
item.description: Top-ranked Carlos Alcaraz is ending his pairing with longtime coach Juan Carlos Ferrero, a partnership that resulted in six Grand Slam titles.

item.title: Ranking the top 50 players in the 2025-26 College Football Playoff
item.description: Who takes the top spot? Our college football experts rank the top 50 players from the College Football Playoff teams.
